statements: UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = 5.0 WHERE ingredient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = quantity + 1.5 WHERE unit_of_measure = 'lbs'
UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = CASE WHEN quantity > 5 THEN quantity - 5 ELSE quantity END
UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = 10 WHERE ingredient_name = 'Salt'

UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE expiration_date < CURDATE()
